Posts.Content: Feb 8, 2016 07:55AM Nebraska917 wrote: I am 29 and wanted an alternative to adriamycin due to the potential of long term heart problems and second hand cancer - it can cause leukemia. I opted for taxotere and cytoxan. Got a second opinion and she said that TC has proven to be just as effective and less harsh and less long term serious side effects.
